text: <@UF718CZ0A> From my understanding last month HubSpot will only support CORS for form submissions and their own hubDB, anything else dynamic isn't supported. A work around would be to feed the API url to a server which in turn would return a CORS header. A dev workaround would be to use available proxy servers such as cors-anywhere, but just for testing since you are risking the exposure of your API key.
